original_text: Their lands and settlements included Bethel and its surrounding villages, Naaran to the east, Gezer and its villages to the west, and Shechem and its villages all the way to Ayyah and its villages.
korean_text: 에브라임 자손의 토지와 거주지는 벧엘과 그 주변 마을이요 동쪽으로는 나아란이요 서쪽에는 게셀과 그 주변 마을이며 또 세겜과 그 주변 마을이니 아사와 그 주변 마을까지이며

sentences.original_text: Their lands and settlements included Bethel
Gezer and its villages to the west
all the way to Ayyah and its villages
